en_text: If you want eyes, I'll be your eyes.    I'll be your limbs. So please...
jp_text: 欲しけりゃおいらが目になってやる！手足んなってやる！だから！
google_translated: I have a glance!It's a hand foot!that's why!

en_text: Don't become a demon!
jp_text: 鬼んなっちゃダメだ！
google_translated: It is no mistake!
